summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nature.co chat application - Firebase-based multi-server chat app with admin functionality

flaky_endpoints.issue: Session occasionally reverts to server selection screen
flaky_endpoints.symptoms: User gets logged out unexpectedly after some navigation actions

ui_bugs.issue: Deneme room visible in sidebar but chat functionality not fully tested due to session instability
Forum and Friends panels load but may not maintain state consistently

integration_issues.issue: Authentication state not persisting consistently across page interactions

passed_tests: Server selection screen - Biyom and Layla servers clickable
Login functionality - admin user authentication with username/password steps
Admin Panel - Users tab showing 4 users correctly
Admin Panel - Rooms tab with create room functionality
Admin Panel - Settings tab with toggle buttons working
Admin Panel - Invite codes tab with generation capability
Main app navigation - All sidebar navigation elements present and clickable
Logout functionality - Logout button found and functional
UI rendering - All panels render correctly when accessed
success_percentage: Frontend: 85% - Most functionality working with some session stability issues
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Firebase authentication session management - users occasionally get logged out during navigation. Investigate why authentication state doesn't persist consistently across different panel navigations.
